short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides some additional bookmarking and sorting of google scholar results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some quality-of-life functions to google scholar tools search results, such as the ability to save a paper as "read" and then hide it from view. If there are no visible items, the page will auto-increment to the next page with unread items. Users can also trash useless results that will not show up as read/unread.
